#summary Configuration of tei2html (in development).

= Introduction =

Currently there are little options to change the generated output, other than setting parameters on the input, or changing the actual code or document.

To make this easier, it will be possible to have a file named `tei2html.config` in which various parameters can be set.

= Current Status =

The default configuration file is:

{{{
    <tei2html.config>
        <defaultStylesheet>style/arctic.css</defaultStylesheet>
        <numberTocEntries>true</numberTocEntries>
        <facsimilePath>page-images</facsimilePath>
    </tei2html.config>
}}}

This can also be found `configuration.xsl`.

= Future Ideas =

 * Sections depending on output type (HTML or ePub)
 * Include images (Y/N/All/Important)
 * Image path (`<path>`)
 * Include external references (Y/N/Colophon Only)
 * Footnote location (Page/Chapter/Work)
 * Generate colophon (Y/N)
 * Generate table of contents (Front/Back/None)
 * Additional CSS stylesheets (`<name>`)
 * CSS stylesheet location (Internal/External)
 * Generate marginal page-numbers (Y/N)
 * Generate links to page-images (Y/N)

{{{
    <tei2html.config>
        <defaultStylesheet>style/arctic.css</defaultStylesheet>
        <additionalStylesheet>custom.css</additionalStylesheet>
        <numberTocEntries>true</numberTocEntries>
        <imagePath>images</imagePath>
        <includeImages>true</includeImages>
        <facsimilePath>page-images</facsimilePath>
       
        <output format="html">
        </output>

        <output format="epub">
        </output>              
    </tei2html.config>
}}}

Things that can also be handled via CSS:

 * Default table alignment (Left/Right/Center)
 * Default verse alignment (Left/Right/Center)
